website_summaries.verdict: Fully lined and with an expandable zipper, this thrifty 20" case is roomy and dependable.
pros: Customers are amazed at the toughness of this case, and say it compares well to name brands
The wheels are smooth and the interior layout is practical
cons: Some felt that the handle has a little too much wiggle
No TSA-compliant lock, should you need to use for check-in

website_summaries.verdict: We love that this basic spinner suitcase comes in a variety of sizes and has well-made, smooth moving wheels.
pros: Fully lined interior and 3 zippered pockets to keep items organized
Spinner wheels glide smoothly and hard exterior offers protection
Gets top marks for its ability to expand 15%
Also option to buy as a set
cons: Not quite as lightweight as some competing models

customer_reviews.title: Images talk by themselves Fits!
customer_reviews.text: Main concern for me was size will fit with carry on regulations. Due to people just upload pictures of issues and what we really need its pictures with luggage in action. Here my experience in images, fits perfects not embarrassing moments.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Adolfo Riveros

customer_reviews.title: Looked good on arrival but couldn't hold up during travel
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Purchased in late October of 2017. Looked good on arrival but couldn't hold up during travel. After only 6 flights the handle came off and the front wheel broke away from the case. No longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: A wheel fell off of this suitcase the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I loved this spinner on my first trip that I took ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this spinner on my first trip that I took over three days. Fast forward to my second trip during which I am using this and the telescopic handle broke the day I flew out! Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great durable and roomy carryon
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my young son - he loved sitting on it- how it rolled easy to carr, fits a lot. Very durable - it tumbled down about 70 steps and not a dent. People at the airport wanted to know what brand it was that held up so good and did not break or open. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good suitcase, but my experience with the Asurion warranty leaves me no choice...
customer_reviews.text: Good suitcase, but unfortunately my experience with the Asurion warranty product leaves me no choice here. The handle broke taking this out if a cab, and the claim experience with Asurion was so horrendous (I wrote a review for this as well), that I will spend another $25-$30 on a better suitcase with a solid manufacturer warranty to avoid having to deal with Asurion ever again. Definitely the reason I won’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken on my first trip!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really upset I just got this product 20 days ago and broke it in my first trip the wheel fell off and the sides are all dented!
customer_reviews.author: Rejane

customer_reviews.title: I like the compartmentalized interior so that you can pack away ...
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to fit in the overhead but also durable if you wanted to check it. I like the compartmentalized interior so that you can pack away dirty clothes from clean clothes or shoes, etc. It was rugged enough to get through a trans-atlantic trip without any problems. I really like the 4-wheel rolling feature, rather than having to always pull it behind you. I would be hesitant to get the larger suitcase though, it can hold A LOT, and I fear it may result in overweight baggage without realizing it. But this smaller version is great and holds a ton of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Elanor Oranges

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it one time, and it’s already falling apart. It’s a low price, yes, but it’s even lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase didn’t even last one flight. Very disappointed in the quality. The stitching came undone and wasn’t very durable. This is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Pena

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The first trip in use, the plastic lift handle (not the pull handle), pulled all the way through the top of the case on a staircase to Madrid subway, could have killed someone if it went flying down the stairs. It was 4 days past the "warranty" period, but thankfully Amazon refunded my money, but I had to find a box to ship this thing back and I'm sure they were going to throw it on the trash heap anyway. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of hard sided luggage and I have to say I'm very impressed. I travel regularly and I recently spent almost $400 for a single Samsonite suitcase similarly sized to the larger suitcase, and the quality between them isn't very far off. With the expansion zipper this thing can hold a ton of luggage, which is great for an overpacker like myself. I would recommend this to anyone looking for high quality luggage at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Braden T

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The handle was a bit hard to get down from the get go. After six months, it stopped going down completely. I’m in Houston Hobby with the replacement I was just forced to buy at Brookstone. If you only fly occasionally, and you are looking for a disposable bag, this one is okay. If you need a reliable bag, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley C. Wallet

customer_reviews.title: Telescope Handle is very Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I recently acquired this suitcase and used it for two trips in September 2018. On my most recent flight from the UK to the US the Telescope Handle got stuck in it's up position as I was attempting to get through security. Fortunately, with assistance, we were able to get the telescope handle to lower back into the suitcase using brute force. I really liked the design and maneuverability of this suitcase, but would caution you to be extremely gentle with the telescope handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Spain

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, dragged all over Spain and Portugal across the ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, dragged all over Spain and Portugal across the cobblestones and on 4 flights and 2 trains and it held up great. My 3 year old daughter rode on top of it the whole time too :)
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaChecca

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made - Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 24" Carbon Black version back in July and I just used it for the first time over the holidays, one of the wheels broke off and the rubber handle also popped off. I had high hopes for this piece of luggage but the fact that important features broke upon first use looks to me that the build quality is very poor. The size and look of the luggage was great, just poorly made. Now I just have a black plastic box to store stuff with since it's pretty useless as luggage now.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy0520

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for a carry on suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I just used this luggage in a recent trip with an airline. While I did not check it and don't know if it would hold up to that rough treatment, it was a perfect carry on suitcase. It was well under the required limits for my airline (Southwest) and I had no problems lugging it around or fitting it in the overhead bins. Additionally, I found it to be very spacious for a small luggage, and had no problems packing items for a full 1 week trip. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a study luggage for small trips and getaways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful wheels. One went missing after it first use.
customer_reviews.text: Good color. Awful wheels. On its first trip (Puerto Rico to Mississippi) one of the wheels went missing. Maybe she wanted to stay and enjoy the beaches.
customer_reviews.author: RLRodz

customer_reviews.title: Solid Luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Hawaii vacation to replace my very old luggage. Since Amazon stands behind all their products, I thought I would give this a try. And I am glad I did! This worked amazing! Compared to similar hard cases, the quality is outstanding! It felt sturdy and rolls like a champ! Too well, since both my boys enjoyed spinning it constantly at the airport! Very spacious luggage. The color was nice and bright making it very easy to spot on the carousel! Absolutely no complaints! Another winner from Amazon!! If you are looking for a solid suitcase, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: DRER

customer_reviews.title: They seem pretty durable - but perhaps not as robust as other ...
customer_reviews.text: These held up well on our recent rip to Europe. They seem pretty durable - but perhaps not as robust as other more expensive brands. One reason I'm not giving full 5 stars - zippers are missing hole for a security lock. I ended up using the loop on the zipper tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be very sturdy and rolls pretty smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I plan on using the luggage this Friday so I will probably update my review once I see how it holds up in the airport. For now, I have packed 4 outfits, 4 pairs of shoes, 3 purses, and toiletries in this thing. It seems to be very sturdy and rolls pretty smoothly. All in all, I am impressed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: STG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice for the money. They aren't perfect...the sides are a little flimsier than I expected, and the zippers aren't the best, but for the once or twice a year travelers like us they can't be beat. The rollers are nice & smooth. I don't know whether it was an intentional design feature or an accident, but they fit PERFECTLY into the cargo well of our Chrysler Pacifica.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Durable and suitable for a child
customer_reviews.text: This isperfect for my almost 6 year old son (45 in tall). The handle adjusts and locks at 2 levels, and the case survived a tumble down the escalator without a scratch. It fit a week's worth of clothes, 2 pairs of shoes, a life jacket, books and toys. I'm considering getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda C.

customer_reviews.title: Wish Walmart had orange suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and texture. No loop for TSA lock. Flimsy zipper came apart once (didn't break, though, so I fixed it).
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable, but overall great!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, they're a good purchase! They have tons of room and great storage compartments! I love that one half can be completely zipped and separated from the other; a great way to keep shoes and clothes apart! They're not the most durable however, but I wasn't really expecting them to be. During my 7 hour flight with a 1 hour layover, the shelled was pushed in, which inverted and opened the zipper (not completely because I had a lock). It's a great purchase if you do light traveling and won't be putting too much wear on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was VERY disappointed - the sides didn't line up when they were ...
customer_reviews.text: Was VERY disappointed - the sides didn't line up when they were zipped, zippers poking out from the sides, and the construction is so cheap that there is NO way I would trust traveling with these. Usually very happy with Amazon products, but bought 3 (1 blue and 2 black) and they all had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: jason snively

customer_reviews.title: Wheels broke after the very first time using it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old, cheap piece of luggage I'd been using for the last 7 years. I paid far more for this than my cheap luggage from before since it was a spinner and had such great reviews. One flight was all it took for this wheels to break on this thing. The wheels stick out so much and are so cheap on this that they broke within hours of using it. Total crap. Now I'm abroad and can't even return/exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: SocraticMethod

customer_reviews.title: I'm always really happy when something works out how I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm always really happy when something works out how I wanted. I ordered an orange suitcase, just big enough for computers and three days of stuff. I could probably get more in there, but everything fits with enough room for extra comforts. Wheels work great on carpet and concrete. Case itself is light weight with good handles. Works like you think it will.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase was used only once. It was not expanded nor was it over stuffed. Got back home to find the zipper had torn away from the hard shell! The overall construction on the piece is flimsy and I was on the fence about keeping it at all. However, I needed it for an upcoming trip. I should have sent it back. The cut off date for returns was yesterday - the day I arrived back home! I don't want a replacement since this is an awful product to begin with and strongly feel a refund is in order because this is clearly a design/construction flaw!! Very disappointed with Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Construction
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets, but returned both because the zippers were not completely attached to the frames.
customer_reviews.author: MarJen

customer_reviews.title: Will Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Went on a trip to Europe and I was surprised how well this held up. It's really light and only got a few scuffs, which I expected. I love the wide range of color selection.
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this luggage. I purchased the orange color and it is really bright and lovely. Now I understand what everyone was talking about with the two different compartments, awesome! I have some issues lifting heavy things and the empty luggage is nice and Light.
customer_reviews.author: L. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage. Holds a lot and is light weight
customer_reviews.text: Nice luggage. Holds a lot and is light weight. I load 70 lbs. in each of the bags and have not yet had any issues. It is hard to maneuver the small bag on top of the large one for whizzing through airports, but I still have to figure out the best way. The wheels are holding up, the zippers work, the room for expansion is great. I'm hard on luggage, so in time I will see how long they hold up. Lightweight allows for more stuff and nice zipped interior.
customer_reviews.author: Lori K

customer_reviews.title: Spinner Luggage Hardside
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carry on item. It holds quite a lot for its size, AND is easy to maneuver. I love the color as it is easy to pick out in luggage carousel. Other colors are also available. It was a tough choice between red and blue, but the blue won me over. This product really surprised in its durability and ease of use. Amazon allows the consumer to order luggage specific to each airline, a great plus to ordering an AmazonBasics product. I highly recommend this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Vamvakias

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value + excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: my husband and I moved from the west coast to the east, using 2 sets of these, packed to the absolute max, (70Lbs) which included our 36" TV. They flew alaska from Seattle to Boston. They arrived without a major scratch, handles in perfect shape, and proceeded to get beaten in the next 45days as we traveled up and down the coast, from car to hotel and back. They are now safe in our closet and still in the near-mint condition we received them. My only wish is that Amazon would expand their color inventory: the black and orange leave a lot to be desired. Otherwise, these are tanks and well worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Took this for a 2 week vacation and it held up great. It's pretty much the perfect size for a long vacation when paired with a backpack. Big enough to hold plenty but still very manageable.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these for traveling and they've been a really great investment. They're super sturdy and the hard exterior ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for traveling and they've been a really great investment. They're super sturdy and the hard exterior really protects the suitcase and everything in it. They all fit into each other making storage easy. The liners inside are convenient and zip off for easy cleaning. There are also plastic clasps inside to keep the contents in place. Wish the liners and clasps were of better quality but overall good quality set!!
customer_reviews.author: TarunB

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my upcoming trip to Mexico. I have loved every AmazonBasic I have tried in the past so i thought i would give this set a shot. First impression is great! Great price and great quality! They are a lot nicer than the set i am replacing. Pros: - They Roll very well - Durable - Zipper to expand the luggage to five you a little more room inisde - Mesh pockets in each on to store small items in. - Straps to hold clothes in - Look awesome! Cons: None yet! Overall: First impression are great! I will be taking them on a trip shortly and will update this post if anything changes!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer S.Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: This is a roomy roller suitcase for a good price. But you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a roomy roller suitcase for a good price. But you get what you pay for. The collapsible handle is SUPER flimsy and has a GIANT wobble when partially or fully extended. It just "feels" cheap, and I doubt it will last with repeated use. One trip out of town and the hard exterior had a massive gouge and black mark. While I can at least chalk part of this up to bag handlers being rough, I feel like this suitcase didn't even put up much of a fight and that it will quickly and heavily wear with repeat use
customer_reviews.author: Ben S

customer_reviews.title: Amazon luggage broke first trip
customer_reviews.text: Product looked as advertised but broke on my first trip. Considering I'm a frequent Amazon product buyer and always happy. I was disappointed on first trip luggage broke. I had bought two diferent luggages for trip and other brand luggage of same style made trip perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G. Schwenneker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Peru 2 days after I got it. It held up great! Sturdy! Great zippers! Love the wheels! You can push it any which way. The expansion option allowed me to fit a fast alpaca blanket in. I like the separation of sides, kept my clothes in order.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: I like the case very much
customer_reviews.text: I like the case very much, pretty color, nice and roomy, but the very first time I used it the wheel broke off. Luckily I bought the insurance. The claim was easy to file. Instead of sending me a new suitcase they are reimbursing me, so not sure if I will buy this one again or look for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Venter

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke on the first trip . What a waste
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic luggage! I purchased two and both felt very sturdy, even on rugged surfaces. Relatively light in weight and very roomy. I purchased these after browsing more expensive brands and I'm glad I went with the Amazon basics brand. They are a very good alternative to much pricier hardside luggage. I will definitely be purchasing the larger versions as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are holding up great. We checked the large and medium size bags
customer_reviews.text: Took these across the country to haul all of the things that a baby needs for a beach vacation (so much stuff!). These are holding up great. We checked the large and medium size bags. We carried the smallest on-board. We had 4 flights, so these were thrown by airline employees at least 16 times (and probably dropped a few too). They are in great shape still just some small black scuff-age. Love these bags. Also so easy to find on the baggage carousel. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bough this beautiful piece of luggage because I have 3 more that are similar. Unfortunately this piece of luggage Handel has broken off twice since I purchased it. I have no way to return this damage item🤔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and tough!
customer_reviews.text: Planes, trains, and automobiles! I drug this suitcase up and down cobblestone streets of London, Pisa, and small hill towns up and down the Italian coast. Plus this case bumped it’s way up and down many, many flights of stairs in many, many train terminals. Also the usual shoving and throwing in baggage terminals, busses, and jamming into car trunks. I brought back wine and olive oil—No cracks or spills! Zippers are thick and tough. Case itself is very light, which helped when bringing back lots of goodies. Very & surprisingly happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AustinsMom

customer_reviews.title: Decent spinner, but heavy and flimsy handles
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than it looks. Keep in mind if using to travel in Asia. Wheels seem to work well. Space is pretty big. However, the worst part is how flimsy and weak the handles are when fully (and even halfway) extended. Not sure how long this will last, too big to return.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Only taken it on one trip, but it performed beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I have only taken the case on one trip, to spend 9 days in Scotland. The case performed beautifully, I have no complaints and it held enough clothing for the trip (with a laundry break halfway) as well as two pairs of shoes. I only take carry-on cases so it is important that theshe be hardworking and maneuverable and this one was both.
customer_reviews.author: tratl1963

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great.
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, easy to find it when it comes off the belt. It kept my computer monitor for getting destroyed, and only has a few scratches on it from my cross country flight. The price was great for the quality of the luggage, i've had more expensive luggage break and destroy its contents in less than one transcontinental Southwest airlines flight. You could spend twice as much and not get something as nice...five stars for the price to value ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Greatest aspect of this suitcase (aside from being hard-sided to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellently laid out, with a zippered panel to keep your things from falling out of one side. Greatest aspect of this suitcase (aside from being hard-sided to protect things and easy to handle with its caster wheels) is that it's lightweight. We have another one that is so much heavier, and despite that, the outer shell still cracked on first use. I love this suitcase. No complaints. Keep em coming, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Schanbacher

customer_reviews.title: Very maneuverable, roomy case.
customer_reviews.text: It is so well balanced and maneuverable. I just got back from a 2 week holiday. Light enough to walk up 2 flights of stairs with in a BnB, but sturdy enough when I checked it in the airplane with breakable souvenirs. The handle telescopes up and down with several adjustment levels. I attached my backpack on top for long walking destinations. It held a surprising amount of packing for a 2 week trip. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Picture in NOT 1,000 words
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Take Note – The Amazon page: “AmazonBasics Hardside Spinner Luggage - Multi-Piece Set “ It claims “MULTI-PIECE SET” with a photo of a 3 piece luggage set. I fell for this and purchased this 2 piece luggage set, not realizing that the photo was not what I was buying. I guess as I was surfing the Amazon luggage sets and I lost focus on the details. Here, I have found that a picture is not worth a thousand words.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Guy

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is incorrect!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much smaller than the size in the listing. It’s not even close to 20” EVEN IF I INCLUDE THE WHEELS. In fact it fits inside my current 20” case.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Marvell-Sellentin

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose for my wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife doesn't travel much, 2-3x a year on flights where she needs just a carry on. This is a nice size and on the smaller size it fits easily in most planes on-board compartments. I however am not impressed with sturdiness, I think it is too flimsy for me since I do 10+ flights/year with a carry on. And I will pass on making larger Amazon Basics luggage a purchase (for an additional 10+ flights/year I do with a checked baggage) since I doubt this would withstand airline baggage handlers tossing and throwing very long.
customer_reviews.author: John Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the durability of these and they look great! I was able to pack all of my things along w/ my 3 kids belongings for a 4 day trip to Florida in all 3pcs. Exactly what I was hoping for. And w/ them all fitting into each other, they’re space savers when stored away. Great buy and price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Nics

customer_reviews.title: Less than Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Decent suitcase. I’m a bit annoyed though as I was under the impression it came with the built in luggage lock which is not the case, that is the later version of the suitcase. Would return for exchange but already discarded the box. This suitcase also does not meet the requirements for carry on luggage, while the dimensions seem to give the illusion that it would.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Took this on its first trip recently and it worked out well! It's a very good buy for the money. It fits easily in an overhead bin and it rolls effortlessly. It's nice looking, too. I've read other reviews and I was a little worried about the handle, but had no problems at all with it. Though it's not super sturdy, it was fine. Also, there's a protection plan offered with purchase, so if it breaks, there's that. I recommend this bag as a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Not the size advertised
customer_reviews.text: The smaller suitcase is not checked bag size. It is a fraction of an inch too thick, but since it is hard coated it won't shrink. Definitely does not fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: I can't return this item because I've used it but I will certainly check next time I buy luggage on Amazon. The lining had a zipper which would have been nice, had the zipper been on the outside of the lining and not the inside. I had to pry the zipper down the best I could to pack clothes into lining part, doesn't anyone do an inspection on their products?
customer_reviews.author: BLOC

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first flight
customer_reviews.text: Pull up mechanism on larger suitcase jammed in an open position causing handling problems. I want to return the large suitcase. I should also say that it only went on one flight, but my thirty days were apparently up because of the trip I was away . I am very disappointed in this product and want to either get it repaired or returned. HOW DO I GET HELP ON THIS ISSUE? I have changed the rating because of the good replacement service Amazon gave me on this item. At the price point, we know this is not top of the line, but it is more than adequate. I was very impressed with the way Amazon handled this issue.
customer_reviews.author: David Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Huge Value.
customer_reviews.text: I found this case to be well designed and easy to keep my things organized. This fits Southwest Airlines carryon size and I was able to easily fit 4-5 days worth of clothing in it. The zippers are sturdy and the retractable handle is adequate. The rollers are very good and I found it easy to maneuver by pulling behind, rolling upright beside me, or pushing in front of me. The hard sides are a huge plus and makes this a much better value than soft-sided bags of the same price. Very glad I purchased this piece of luggage.
customer_reviews.author: chikinhammr

customer_reviews.title: Planes, Trains, Automobiles, and Ferries
customer_reviews.text: When I began searching for a bag, I knew that I was going to be asking a lot from it during a two week trip where we would be changing locations almost every day. In the past two years I have had several of my suitcases give up during my travels. On this trip I was traveling light. Just this 20 inch bag as my carry on and a small backpack. From cobblestone streets, being tossed onto buses, ferries, trains, planes, and more this bag proved to be an amazing travel companion. This bag was light, roomy, and easy to maneuver.I am defiantly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bonney

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought and used these for a 3 week European vacation across 3 countries, 6 cities, 5 flights and countless train rides. They’re SUPER light weight (large on is only 10 lbs), and very sturdy. I would advise getting your own luggage tags because I picked up someone else’s suitcase a couple of times (oops!!). Cons are: the big one is easy to put overweight because it’s so spacious so be careful; no outside pockets for storage (although you don’t really need those).
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Cute, basic, small suitcase with spinners
customer_reviews.text: This little suitcase is pretty great. It fits a ton of stuff inside (I was able to fit more in this suitcase than my older larger carry on bag). The bag rolls nicely. I was a little concerned with the wheels as they stick out, but I have checked the bag twice and it held up fine despite the typical baggage handling. The handle extends high enough for a taller person to comfortably use, although it feels a little loose. The burnt orange color is nice — not too bright and easy to find in baggage claim.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, fantastic luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage at a great price. These went to and from Orlando with minor scuffing. Hold much and are very light. The wheels are awesome and allowed for quick travel through two airports, even with 3 little boys! Excellent quality for the price. I will buy these for gifts for grads for sure.
customer_reviews.author: LizEEE

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the suitcase and the fact that there are two separate compartments so I can easily transport by suits in one side and my casual wear in the other. With that being said the very first time I traveled on American Airlines the corner of the suitcase became pretty scuffed up which makes me think the outer plastic shell isn’t up to par with some other namebrand products. I do love how easily this suitcase rolls when being pulled normally or gently pushed sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's really good, but it's starting to break down on me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was looking for a cheap carry on bag, It's really nice for the price, Lightweight and can fit a lot of stuff you pack correctly. Has the right pocket and zippers inside the bag, I've had mine for a little over a year now and now the handle bar extension is giving me a little bit of trouble her and there. it's not as smooth as it once was and sometimes I may have to try several times before it either extends or collapses.
customer_reviews.author: Ike Anyanwu

customer_reviews.title: No lock, but otherwise as good as a $129 Samsonite carry-on
customer_reviews.text: My significant other bought a Samsonite carry-on that looks nearly identical except it has an integrated lock and retailed for $129, on sale for $89. It has fewer internal compartments, and she wishes she had mine. Mine was $40 cheaper than her “sale” price. ‘Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: R. Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the airport. Built in compartment are nice. Bought a very inexpensive warranty with it. Glides like a champ in the airport. I filled 4 days of clothing for work and play and a pair of dress shoes. It does the job. Fit easily in the over in compartment even when extended. Great price solid product.
customer_reviews.author: khumalo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed to travel on United Airlines
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about getting the 20inches Rockland carry on but I was worried about the airlines carry on size requirement. I am glad I purchased the amazonBasics Harside Spinner. The measurements included the wheels are 21.5 X 14 X 9. It should be allowed on an airplane....just don't expand it.
customer_reviews.author: Pass G

customer_reviews.title: Quality 😬
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking suitcases and at first I was impressed. However on my very first trip I had only packed about half full and the zipper broke before I left the house. Maybe I just got a bad one but I would never trust these bag with abusive airline handlers so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: MN Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Packs the goods.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first carr ugh on luggage bag, I normally just traveled with a backpack however for a longer trip I got this and packed it right up, fit all the stuff I needed and it roles great. Nice hard case is sturdy and the zipper seems pretty good. I got it in orange so I can see it very well when I need to have I tdd checked so I strongly suggest getting any other color so if we end up on the same flight we don't have a mix match so... you know, if you could go ahead and do that, that would be great....
customer_reviews.author: Andy L.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, very maneuverable. Bought this for my father in law as like an over night/weekend suitcase since he can’t carry a duffel bag due to weight. He loves it, very light weight and the wheels can roll in any direction and smoothly. The outer shell seems very durable and strong and the inside is very spacious. He’s had it for about 3 months now and it still looks brand new after many uses!
customer_reviews.author: katelyn breeden

customer_reviews.title: Damaged - torn at zipper panel
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product arrived damaged - torn at the zipper. It was not available for replacement because it was sold as a set. Now I am going thru the process to obtain a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mervin K Staton

customer_reviews.title: Great value without sacrificing quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value for hard sided luggage. We took this and two other matching pieces on a family trip to Disney World and they were easy to roll through the airport and stood up very well to baggage handlers. We have taken several other trips with them and they are very easy to use. One can be packed and zipped closed and the other is held in place with the elastic band which works great to keep everything in place. Looking forward to many more years of service from these pieces.
customer_reviews.author: joshf128

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t buy these ones, I want to have the only orange ones.
customer_reviews.text: great bag for the money. I have had a lot of bags that have not lasted more than a few years and this might be another one. So far, it’s been great and perhaps what I like most about it is the orange color, which helps prevent mistakes at the baggage claim. It’s holding up well but it’s still new so I’ll have to update this later if my opinion changes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Majors

customer_reviews.title: Expected more sturdy exterior
customer_reviews.text: Not a hard shell. Plastic gives easily. Expected something more sturdy. Doesn’t hold as much as nylon or other soft sided luggage. Easy to spot in airport, looks good in orange but somewhat disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: texzen

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Dragged down miles of brick and cobblestone streets in Spain and held up great. I could imagine it could dent if I’d checked it, but the one I bought was carry on size. I have another hard shell that I paid more for a Wal Mart that seems slightly harder on the outside, but this suitsme fine. For the price I liked the color choices. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AHawes

customer_reviews.title: Broke the very first time I used it!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk!!! I bought this suitcase for a week long vacation and as I was taking it out of the overhead bin the handle snapped off. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: thisismypenname

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a trip, the bigger one was able to fit quite a lot of clothes without going over the airline weight limit. I like the blue color and very easy to distinguish my luggage from everyone else. Especially I love the wheels on this luggage, I was able to push them with each arm and the wheels easily adjusted to whichever direction I went. There are certainly cheaper options and there are more expensive options , but this set is the right value for me. They are well designed and made with quality material and seem fairly sturdy and spacious. Overall they fit both my needs and budget.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry J.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, rolls easy, holds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from a two week trip to Italy. It worked great, it rolled easily, was light weight which was important climbing stairs fully loaded, packed great and did everything we wanted it to do. We had no trouble putting in overhead bin. We will likely be ordering the next larger ones soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Rolls easy
customer_reviews.text: I take an average of 5 to 7 trips every 6 months and wanted something to replace my old suitcase that would be easy to spot in the event I had to check my bag, so I ordered orange. After my most recent trip I can tell you it is VERY easy to spot from a distance. It also rolls very nicely. It is standard carry on size for most airlines unless you board a small commuter transport. There is plenty of room for a 5 day trip. The lining on the inside is durable and has enough pockets for the necessities. I would buy this again. Actually I might buy the blue one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Suz - Wellnessgirl

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: If it appears to be to good to be true, it may be! I struggled getting these, but the reviews were good so I took the chance. We've used the larger bag 5 times and the the zipper that operates the expandable option is no longer operable. We never used it expanded because we felt that we would have exceeded the weight limitation. The others seem to be holding up OK. Definitely a disappointment, lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: fourbohans

customer_reviews.title: Safely protected from damage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry additional photography equipment with me on location. It has worked out great for me. Plenty of room to meet my needs. Last wedding shoot, I packed a tripod, 2 flashes, 2 additional lens, 2 large bath towels, rain boots, rain coat, a change of clothes, snacks, and other various small items. There was still room for other items. The hardside case is durable and I feel that my equipment is safely protected from damage. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Survived our travel around the world
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the 26 in for my teenage daughters. They survived all of our summer trips in perfect shape. We took them to Hawaii and Africa, checked many times on many different airlines. The wheels have great maneuverability. The bag has plenty of room, even with 2 teenage girls. I am very picky. I am a 25 year Flight attendant, and these bags met every need.
customer_reviews.author: Meegan Alphin

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping handle issues on two bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these about 16 months ago; one for my wife and one for my daughter. They don’t travel as much as I do and have maybe taken 3-4 trips each. On both, the telescoping handle has started giving a lot of trouble in collapsing back down. You either have to open the suitcase and does the buttons that snap it into the up position or pull up the handle only part way to avoid it getting locked in the first place. In either case, wire a pain to deal with. I travel a lot and spend more on luggage believing you get what you post for and was proven right again on this
customer_reviews.author: Jason DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: Luggage was damaged
customer_reviews.text: I like this 3 pc set a lot. rolls easily, light weight when empty.VERY EASY to spot on airport carousel!! That's the best part. However, the large piece came damaged. I did not notice until I tried to expand the luggage. Fabric is torn away from bag. It appears someone returned this after it was used with the damage. There were also scrapes and dirt on the outside appearing as if it had been used. I am planning to replace the large piece ASAP. Still like the set!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not size compliant on all airlines, but good quality luggage
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this based on the review pics that it fit in overheads and was in compliance with the size limitations. However it was NOT in compliance with the airline I took in my trip. I believe it could have fit, however I was not allowed to take it as carryon and was required to check it. I recommend checking with each airline because the each have their own measurements and there is NOT one standard. I flew on Delta Airlines.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Hollerich

customer_reviews.title: Tough carry on bag.
customer_reviews.text: I travel most weeks for work and the new carry on regulations for my favorite airline required me to downsize my luggage. I have traveled on three flights so far with this bag and I really like it. It glides easily through the airport and my briefcase sits nicely on the top. This bag is sturdy and allows for easy organization of my shoes and clothes. Best of all it fits in the overhead bins so I have not been required to check it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I like the dimensions because it works on European airlines as a carry-on and it seems very sturdy and well-built from the first used with it for a three week trip in Europe with multiple stops. The other new piece of luggage like this I bought for the trip was from Costco and the handle broke on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: We bought this to send my kid to college. ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to send my kid to college. The small handle on the large suitcase (not the extendable) came off the first time we used it to try to put the suitcase in the car. The handle on the side came off 4 days later when we were unloading it. Neither could be put back on. Not having handles makes it difficult to lift or maneuver into car, etc. The suitcase was not overloaded or packed with anything heavy, though it was full of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Quillen Boston

customer_reviews.title: Fits in overhead bin on Spirit Airlines and JetBlue
customer_reviews.text: Wow. A fantastic bag for the price point. I was able to fit a pair of 4 inch wedges, maybe 7-8 dresses, a pair of pajamas, two flat sandals, a pair of tights, and two tops in this seamlessly. I worried that it was too small, but it compresses easily. This fits right in the test size bin at the airport for JetBlue. There is no way this can fit in a Spirit test size bin and pass the test, but if you can make it on the plane with this, it will fit in the overhead storage on a Spirit plane. Great functionality and all way swivel!
customer_reviews.author: Cat mom

customer_reviews.title: Great little carryon
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but wish it were 1-2 inches taller. I have size 10.5 shoes and like to take a pair of exercise shoes when I travel. These take up 25% of the case. So the case is great for a 1-2 day trip because it does not leave much room for more clothes than that. I did take a 1 week trip with it but needed an additional back pack to fit everything. Quality seems great and wheels work to great, I’m tall and the handle comes up high enough to comfortably grab. This is perfect for our kids who have smaller clothes and we can fit plenty in there for them.
customer_reviews.author: Summerville

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This travelled all over the world and was so easy to maneuver. It was very durable.
customer_reviews.author: crazyhobbit

customer_reviews.title: Traveled everywhere with this and haven't had a problem
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and pleasure and was in a rush to buy a new medium sized suitcase. Was a little skeptical but worse case I'd use it for a little bit. Other all, I've used this thing 30+ times and havent' had any issues. I've seen it thrown all over the place and crushed and always came back to life. I even had a jar of pickles break in there and was able to wash the insides with no issues. Best travel purchase, especially since it's like more than half the price of the alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very bad
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned this. Seam split on first use.
customer_reviews.author: IsaacS

customer_reviews.title: A decent suitcase
customer_reviews.text: It looks to be well-made and I love the color - especially with the lime-green tags that I also got. It is shorter and fatter than what I understand to be the standard carry on luggage size - I hope that will not be a problem. Also, I would prefer to have just one larger compartment inside, rather than two small ones - with the floppitiy cloth hinge connecting them - but that seems to be the style these days - but I really cannot give it 5-stars - it was just the best I could do under the circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Steve SB

customer_reviews.title: and it fits just fine in Delta carry on
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the handle is a little flimsy feeling (pretty wobbly) but I had no troubles, and it fits just fine in Delta carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! UPDATE!
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost a year of weekly travel. Airports, car trunks, up and down stairs... STILL GOING STRONG! For the price, you will not find a better carry on suitcase. I travel 3 days every week and this will hold my small toiletries bag, one pair of size 8 shoes, 2 pants, 2 shirts, 2 full sets of underwear. Very sturdy bag and the 4 wheels are great for airports and it fits perfectly in the overhead. You will not be disappointed with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Hardside Spinner, Carry-On, Expandable Suitcase Luggage with Wheels, 21 Inch, Black
feature_bullets: Black, Small 21-inch hardside spinner luggage for weekend getaways or as international carry-on
Protective hard shell with scratch-resistant finish; made of extra-thick ABS (thicker than the competition) for enhanced strength and durability
Fully lined interior with divider; 150D-polyester interior organizer with 3 zippered pockets for conveniently storing smaller items
Expandable for up to 15% additional packing capacity; solid, strong zippers; telescoping handle for comfortable maneuvering; securely mounted short handle
4 double spinner wheels ensure smooth-rolling mobility in any direction
Suitcase Dimensions: Outer (including wheels): 14.9 x 10 x 21.6 Inches; Interior dimensions: 13.3 x 9.6 x 18.5 Inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars14,490 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
